Package net.sf.appia.protocols.total.switching

Protocol that implements an algorithm to switch between Total Order algorithms.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
EventContainer Container for events stored by the Total Order Switching protocol.
NullEvent This class defines the NullEvent as specified in the Total Order Switching algorithm.
NullEventTimer This class defines a timer that is associated with the sending of a NullEvent in the Total Order Switching protocol.
SwitchEvent This class defines a SwitchEvent that is used to signal the start of the Total Order Switching procedure.
SwitchingLayer This class defines a SwitchingLayer
SwitchingSession Protocol that implements an algorithm to switch between Total Order algorithms.
 

Package net.sf.appia.protocols.total.switching Description

Protocol that implements an algorithm to switch between Total Order algorithms.

If the parameter firstChannel is defined, then the corresponding channel is used initially. Otherwise, the initial channel is the one associated with the first ChannelInit received by this session.

Configuration parameters:

  • topChannel []: the top channel name. Default: topChannel
  • firstChannel []: the initial bottom channel name. Default: First channel
